channel.title: GDACS RSS information
channel.description: Near real-time alerts about natural disaster with a potential humanitarian impact

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 6M, Depth:10km) in Vanuatu 20/06/2016 03:50 UTC, About 13606 people within 100km.
item.description: On 6/20/2016 3:50:54 AM, an earthquake occurred in Vanuatu potentially affecting About 13606 people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 6M, Depth:10km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1

item.title: Green alert for tropical cyclone DANIELLE-16. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.
item.description: From 19/06/2016 to 21/06/2016, a Tropical Depression (maximum wind speed of 74 km/h) DANIELLE-16 was active in Atlantic. The cyclone affects these countries: Mexico (vulnerability Medium). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Tropical Depression (maximum wind speed of 74 km/h)
item.gdacs:population: Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: Map of rainfall accummulation in past 24h
Map of extreme rainfall
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: The map shows the accumulated precipitation along the cyclone's track. Yellow area is > 100mm; Red area is > 300mm; Blue area is > 500mm. The accumulated rainfall is calculated based on the Tropical Rainfall Potential of NOAA/NESDIS. The eTRaP is a simple ensemble whose members are the 6-hourly totals from the single-orbit TRaPs, which are rainfall estimates from passive microwave remote sensing.
gdacs:resource.gdacs:acknowledgements: Copyright European Union. Syndication allowed, provided the source is acknowledged.

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 6.3M, Depth:13.64km) in Vanuatu 19/06/2016 09:47 UTC, About 703 people within 100km.
item.description: On 6/19/2016 9:47:22 AM, an earthquake occurred in Vanuatu potentially affecting About 703 people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 6.3M, Depth:13.64km.

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:47.31km) in Indonesia 18/06/2016 21:15 UTC, 427192 people within 100km.
item.description: On 6/18/2016 9:15:51 PM, an earthquake occurred in Indonesia potentially affecting 427192 people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:47.31km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1
